casebody.data:
STATE OF MONTANA, Plaintiff, vs. MARVIN B. HOWETH, JR., Defendant.

DECISION

No. 10152 DATED this 13th day of May, 1977.

The application of the above-named defendant for a review of the sentence of Twenty years imposed on February 28, 1977, was fully heard and after a careful consideration of the entire matter it is decided that:

The sentence be and remain as originally imposed.

We wish to thank Neal Jensen, of the Montana Defender Project, for his assistance to the defendant and to this Court.

SENTENCE REVIEW DIVISION

Jack L. Green, Chairman; Robert C. Sykes, Peter G. Meloy.
